DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Estimated_relative_performance_Fig3
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Aquatic and aerial thermal performance curves described for Pisaster ochraceus and Mytilus californianus from Bodega (California) and Strawberry Hill (Oregon). We estimated the aquatic curves’ parameters using empirical SMR measurements (Pisaster_Mytilus_SMR_Fig2), and the aerial curves’ parameters using information from the literature.
